name: subggrp
params: class c0, class c1, class c2

stmt.origin: syl5eqel(c2, cgrp, co(c1, cress, c0), wcel(c0, cfv(csubg, c1)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(csubg, c1)), wcel(c2, cgrp))
-| wceq(c2, co(c1, cress, c0))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cfv(csubg, c1)), wcel(co(c1, cress, c0), cgrp))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈(SubGrp ` c1)→ c2 ∈ Grp)
⊣ c2 =(c1[|`s]c0)
⊣ (c0 ∈(SubGrp ` c1)→(c1[|`s]c0)∈ Grp)
